/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their architecture hinting at the blend of traditional and modern styles that are characteristic of Beijing. The sky above is a clear blue, with power lines crisscrossing above the street, adding a touch of urbanity to the scene. In the distance, trees can be seen, their green foliage contrasting with the urban landscape. The image is bathed in the soft light of day, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
